模块 com.example.demo
程序包 com.example.tuition

类 Controller

java.lang.Object
com.example.tuition.Controller
public class Controller extends Object
The class contains the methods which serve for the functions of interface. This contains the variables methods for executing the interface service.
作者:
Xinyu Meng, Chengyu Liang
